DOC.brief_summary: The study examines the effect of two diets on fasting and post fat load lipoproteins of subjects with type 2 diabetes with moderate hypertriglyceridemia.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Changing Diet on Fasting and Post Fat Load Lipoproteins
DOC.criteria: Male and female, 18 75 years of age Type 2 diabetes Fasting triglycerides 300 800mg/dL
